robot_capabilities.dishwasher_robot_arm_1: Stationed at the dish intake zone. Equipped with a gripper, camera, and conveyor interface. Responsible for picking up dirty dishes and placing them on the washing rack.
robot_capabilities.dishwasher_robot_arm_2: Positioned at the detergent and wash zone. It can can refill soap or any claening item. Equipped with sprayers and scrub tools. Handles initial cleaning, rinsing, and soap application.
robot_capabilities.dishwasher_robot_arm_3: Handles post-wash inspection. Equipped with vision system and drying nozzle. Inspects dishes for residue and performs spot drying.
robot_capabilities.dishwasher_robot_arm_4: Located at the sorting and stacking area. Picks cleaned dishes and stacks them in proper storage bins or trolleys or can put them to dry. Equipped with a sorting algorithm and placement gripper.

task_replanning_rules: If one robot arm is non-responsive or under maintenance, reassign its tasks to an adjacent available robot if possible.
If item slippage or detection error occurs, restart from intake and notify log system.
Pause all downstream actions if inspection fails until issue is resolved.
while cleaning the cleanig place all robots must help each other, and all robots should change the cleaning brushes and the cleaning items.
